channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Coru LFMember
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Coru LFMember

item.title: CVE-2022-1618|2024-08-29T14:32:10.834Z -- unknown -- coru%20lfmember
item.description: The Coru LFMember WordPress plugin through 1.0.2 does not have CSRF check in place when adding a new game, and is lacking sanitisation as well as escaping in their settings, allowing attacker to make a logged in admin add an arbitrary game with XSS payloads
